title: Date of the contract
explanation: The date is explicitly mentioned as 'dated as of April 2, 2020' in the contract.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is identified as 'HSBC BANK USA, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION' in the contract.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is identified as 'ADVANCED ENERGY INDUSTRIES, INC.' in the contract.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' means in relation to Party A, none.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' means in relation to Party B, none.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text states that 'Specified Transaction' will have the meaning specified in Section 14, which aligns with the standard definition.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that the 'Cross-Default' provisions apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention borrowed money in relation to specified indebtedness.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that specified indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of a party's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: The text specifies a percentage for Party A, not a fixed amount.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: The text specifies a percentage for Party A, not a fixed currency amount.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states 'three percent (3%)' for Party A.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: The text refers to 'Party A's shareholders' equity' as the reference.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: The text explicitly states 'USD 50,000,000' for Party B.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: The text specifies the amount in 'USD' for Party B.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: The text specifies a fixed amount for Party B, not a percentage.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: The text specifies a fixed amount for Party B, not a percentage reference.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that the 'Automatic Early Termination' provision will not apply to either Party A or Party B.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code 'USD'.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: The email for notices to Party A is explicitly mentioned under the section for Party A's address for notices.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: The email for notices to Party B is explicitly mentioned under the section for Party B's address for notices.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not Applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party A, no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party A, no address is provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Not Applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party B, no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: Since process agent is not applicable for Party B, no address is provided.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A is not a Multibranch Party.'

explanation: Since Party A is not a Multibranch Party, there are no offices to list.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party

title: Party B offices
explanation: Since Party B is not a Multibranch Party, there are no offices to list.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Calculation Agent is Party A' as the default condition.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states that the agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
